Package nl.codevs.strinput.system.text

Class Str

java.lang.Object
nl.codevs.strinput.system.text.Str
public class Str extends Object
Messages passing through the system.
Has additional properties such as colors, on-click events and hovering.

Note that the actual text of this component is stored in content.
The way to read-out strings is by going back to previous and getting its content, and then back to...
which contains other related string components (in order) with potentially different values and properties.
Since:
v0.1

  • Method Details

    • getMainColor

      public C getMainColor()
      Get the main color of the Str.
      Returns:
      the main color

    • getGradientColor

      public C getGradientColor()
      This is the end color of the gradient. The first color is found in mainColor.
      Make sure to check isGradient() to ensure this Str is actually gradient.
      Returns:
      the end color of the gradient

    • getOnHover

      public Str getOnHover()
      Get what to display on hover (Str).
      Returns:

      Returns:
      a new Str without hover

      Returns:
      true if it is gradient

      @NotNull public @NotNull Str add​(@NotNull @NotNull C color)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • add

      @NotNull public @NotNull Str add​(@NotNull @NotNull C startColor, @NotNull @NotNull C endColor)
      Add a new color gradient, which will affect text added from here on out.
      This keeps any hover or on-click effect the previous node may have.
      Parameters:
      startColor - the start of the gradient color
      endColor - the end of the gradient color
      Returns:
      the Str

    • toHumanReadable

      @NotNull public @NotNull String toHumanReadable()
      Returns a string representation of the object.
      Note that this removes any non-text component from the Str.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the object.

    • copy

      @NotNull public @NotNull Str copy()
      Make a copy of this Str to prevent previous copies from being modified.
      Returns:
      a copy of this

    • copy

      @NotNull public @NotNull Str copy​(boolean deep)
      Make a copy of this Str to prevent previous copies from being modified.
      Parameters:
      deep - also makes copies of previous nodes
      Returns:
      the last (right-most) node in the chain; a copy of the Str this was run on.
